title: Some basic javadoc for XMLWriter#startTag
description: Here's some javadoc for the XMLWriter#startTag method. It was unclear to me what this method actually did (while writing a FieldType), so I looked up the code, and decided I'd document what I found.

comments.author: Hoss Man
comments.content:

Thanks Chris.
